extension.description:
[COLOR mediumpurple][B]CTOON Kodi[/B][/COLOR]
A simple addon for streaming cartoons from the [B]ctoon.party[/B] website.
Help keep CTOON alive, donate to the host: [COLOR khaki][B]ko-fi.com/A637AV5[/B][/COLOR]
